title: 29 Must-Have Pieces From Luisaviaroma to Refresh Your Spring Wardrobe
excerpt: Our associate editor picked out the best spring pieces from Luisaviaroma, including flowy dresses, cream basics, and elevated accessories with pops of color.
text: Spring has officially sprung, and with it comes the ultimate excuse for a wardrobe refresh. The heavy coats? Stored. The chunky knits? Retired (for now). It's time to say goodbye to winter layers and step into something a little lighter and brighter. Naturally, I turned to Luisaviaroma to see what the spring collection was serving, and I was not disappointed.I spent more time than I'd like to admit scrolling through the site's latest arrivals, and it was worth every second. The new-arrivals section is a perfect mix of luxury designer pieces and more affordable finds, and each piece is worth adding to your cart. From crisp whites and soft creams to delicate pops of color that feel like a breath of fresh air (or better yet, a spontaneous picnic in the park), these picks are too good not to share. Think sleek staples, standout dresses, and elevated essentials that make transitioning out of winter feel like a total luxury. Don't wait—these pieces won't be around for long. 16arlington Hornet Sequined Top I've been loving this shade of green recently, and can we talk about the sequins? This is truly the ideal spring going-out top. Dragon Diffusion Egola Hand-Braided Leather Tote Bag This blush-pink tote screams spring. Sara Cristina Playa Silk Wide Leg Pants W/ Pearl These lightweight silk pants are giving effortless elegance, ideal for warm days when you still want to serve a look. And that pearl detail? *Chef's kiss.* Sara Cristina Nerea Silk Long Sleeve Top W/ Pearl Pair this silky top with the matching Sara Cristina pants for a sleek head-to-toe look that's perfect for any occasion. Pucci Printed Silk Long Dress I'm booking a beach vacation to have the perfect excuse to wear this dress. Christian Louboutin 20mm Sweetie Jane Patent Flats These flats add a pop of color to any spring outfit. Weekend Max Mara Magia Sleeveless Denim Top Pair with jeans for the ideal denim-on-denim look. Jacquemus Le Bob Soli Raffia Bucket Hat I see myself wearing this hat by the pool with a piña colada in hand. Giuseppe Di Morabito Draped Viscose Jersey Top The color and detailing of this top are just incredible. Adidas Originals Tokyo Sneakers If you love Sambas but want something a little different, these sneakers are calling your name. And this color combo? Absolutely unbeatable. Versace Stretch Viscose Knit Midi Dress From the color to the fit to the slit in the back, this dress speaks for itself. Max Mara Carnet Silk Satin Midi Skirt Flowy and silky, this skirt is an easy way to add elegance to any look, whether you're dressing it up with heels or keeping it casual with a tee. Forte_forte is really killing it with spring pieces this season. These shorts are a great alternative to linen pants when it starts getting super-hot out. Jacquemus La Pochette Salon Leather Shoulder Bag The pop of color is the perfect addition to your next night-out look. Etro Printed Cotton & Silk Long Dress I'm really into the pattern and colors on this dress. It's the perfect blend of chic and playful for sunny spring days. Philosophy Di Lorenzo Serafini Draped Cotton Blend Lace Top Such a gorgeous, dainty top—perfect for warmer weather. Mother The Fangirl Button Skimp Jeans These jeans are flattering in all the right places, making them a staple for the new season. Jimmy Choo 45mm Didi Leather Slingbacks These sleek heels would look great with an all-white look. Max Mara Valois Knitted Long Dress This knit dress is a total game changer: cozy, chic, and perfect for a seamless day-to-night look. Weekend Max Mara Salita Cotton Drill Jacket This jacket is the perfect go-to for those chilly spring days, giving you the right mix of warmth and style. A silky top that ties in the back for a flattering, cinched look. Say less! Aeyde 10mm Uma Zebra Print Ballerina Flats Say goodbye to leopard print and hello to these gorgeous zebra-print ballet flats, an easy way to add flair to a simple outfit. Ermanno Scervino Viscose Long Skirt This dreamy skirt pairs perfectly with a crisp white tee and ballet flats for a casual vibe, or you can dress it up with heels and a tailored top for an elevated evening look. Aya Muse Draped Viscose Jersey Top This top is the ultimate cool-girl piece. Pair it with wide-leg trousers for a sleek night-out look or relaxed jeans and kitten heels for an elevated, casual vibe. Autry Windspin Low Sneakers Blush pink is the color to go for this spring, and these sneakers add just the right amount of soft, feminine flair to any casual look. Forte_forte Elastic Waist Poplin Midi Skirt This skirt's soft fabric and relaxed fit make it ideal for a breezy afternoon stroll or a casual lunch date, effortlessly blending comfort and style. Lié Studio The Esther Hoop Earrings I need these earrings immediately. They're the ideal mix of chic and bold, and they'll elevate any outfit. Chloé Embroidered Lace Lingerie Blouse Chloé knew what it was doing with this top. Pair it with your favorite jeans or a flowy skirt for the ultimate seasonal look. Blumarine Georgette Halter Top Sheer tops are having a moment, and this flowy off-the-shoulder halter top is the chicest way to rock the trend.
html:
Spring has officially sprung, and with it comes the ultimate excuse for a wardrobe refresh. The heavy coats? Stored. The chunky knits? Retired (for now). It's time to say goodbye to winter layers and step into something a little lighter and brighter. Naturally, I turned to Luisaviaroma to see what the spring collection was serving, and I was not disappointed.

I spent more time than I'd like to admit scrolling through the site's latest arrivals, and it was worth every second. The new-arrivals section is a perfect mix of luxury designer pieces and more affordable finds, and each piece is worth adding to your cart. From crisp whites and soft creams to delicate pops of color that feel like a breath of fresh air (or better yet, a spontaneous picnic in the park), these picks are too good not to share. Think sleek staples, standout dresses, and elevated essentials that make transitioning out of winter feel like a total luxury. Don't wait—these pieces won't be around for long.

16arlington

Hornet Sequined Top

I've been loving this shade of green recently, and can we talk about the sequins? This is truly the ideal spring going-out top.

Dragon Diffusion

Egola Hand-Braided Leather Tote Bag

This blush-pink tote screams spring.

Sara Cristina

Playa Silk Wide Leg Pants W/ Pearl

These lightweight silk pants are giving effortless elegance, ideal for warm days when you still want to serve a look. And that pearl detail? *Chef's kiss.*

Sara Cristina

Nerea Silk Long Sleeve Top W/ Pearl

Pair this silky top with the matching Sara Cristina pants for a sleek head-to-toe look that's perfect for any occasion.

Pucci

Printed Silk Long Dress

I'm booking a beach vacation to have the perfect excuse to wear this dress.

Christian Louboutin

20mm Sweetie Jane Patent Flats

These flats add a pop of color to any spring outfit.

Weekend Max Mara

Magia Sleeveless Denim Top

Pair with jeans for the ideal denim-on-denim look.

Jacquemus

Le Bob Soli Raffia Bucket Hat

I see myself wearing this hat by the pool with a piña colada in hand.

Giuseppe Di Morabito

Draped Viscose Jersey Top

The color and detailing of this top are just incredible.

Adidas Originals

Tokyo Sneakers

If you love Sambas but want something a little different, these sneakers are calling your name. And this color combo? Absolutely unbeatable.

Versace

Stretch Viscose Knit Midi Dress

From the color to the fit to the slit in the back, this dress speaks for itself.

Max Mara

Carnet Silk Satin Midi Skirt

Flowy and silky, this skirt is an easy way to add elegance to any look, whether you're dressing it up with heels or keeping it casual with a tee.

Forte_forte is really killing it with spring pieces this season. These shorts are a great alternative to linen pants when it starts getting super-hot out.

Jacquemus

La Pochette Salon Leather Shoulder Bag

The pop of color is the perfect addition to your next night-out look.

Etro

Printed Cotton & Silk Long Dress

I'm really into the pattern and colors on this dress. It's the perfect blend of chic and playful for sunny spring days.

Philosophy Di Lorenzo Serafini

Draped Cotton Blend Lace Top

Such a gorgeous, dainty top—perfect for warmer weather.

Mother

The Fangirl Button Skimp Jeans

These jeans are flattering in all the right places, making them a staple for the new season.

Jimmy Choo

45mm Didi Leather Slingbacks

These sleek heels would look great with an all-white look.

Max Mara

Valois Knitted Long Dress

This knit dress is a total game changer: cozy, chic, and perfect for a seamless day-to-night look.

Weekend Max Mara

Salita Cotton Drill Jacket

This jacket is the perfect go-to for those chilly spring days, giving you the right mix of warmth and style.

A silky top that ties in the back for a flattering, cinched look. Say less!

Aeyde

10mm Uma Zebra Print Ballerina Flats

Say goodbye to leopard print and hello to these gorgeous zebra-print ballet flats, an easy way to add flair to a simple outfit.

Ermanno Scervino

Viscose Long Skirt

This dreamy skirt pairs perfectly with a crisp white tee and ballet flats for a casual vibe, or you can dress it up with heels and a tailored top for an elevated evening look.

Aya Muse

Draped Viscose Jersey Top

This top is the ultimate cool-girl piece. Pair it with wide-leg trousers for a sleek night-out look or relaxed jeans and kitten heels for an elevated, casual vibe.

Autry

Windspin Low Sneakers

Blush pink is the color to go for this spring, and these sneakers add just the right amount of soft, feminine flair to any casual look.

Forte_forte

Elastic Waist Poplin Midi Skirt

This skirt's soft fabric and relaxed fit make it ideal for a breezy afternoon stroll or a casual lunch date, effortlessly blending comfort and style.

Lié Studio

The Esther Hoop Earrings

I need these earrings immediately. They're the ideal mix of chic and bold, and they'll elevate any outfit.

Chloé

Embroidered Lace Lingerie Blouse

Chloé knew what it was doing with this top. Pair it with your favorite jeans or a flowy skirt for the ultimate seasonal look.

Blumarine

Georgette Halter Top

Sheer tops are having a moment, and this flowy off-the-shoulder halter top is the chicest way to rock the trend.
